text: Thanks for the update <@U0625KF6RLH>! Will we have class Monday 1/22 or Thursday 1/25, or are those times just for makeup demos/interviews?

elements.text: ! Will we have class Monday 1/22 or Thursday 1/25, or are those times just for makeup demos/interviews?

text: Yes, there is class both days

elements.text: Yes, there is class both days

text:
<!channel>
As of right now I am waiting on scores to come in for 62 learners. I imagine our TAs may be able to get through 20-30 additional learners. Likely, many of you will not go. I appreciate your flexibility and patience as I know it can be hard to wait for an opportunity to demo and not go.

If you have a conflict Monday during class and have not yet demoed tonight, please message me, Lexi, and Colin ASAP.

 We will communicate plans for a Demo schedule tomorrow for during Monday's class.

text:
<!channel>
That is a wrap for demo day! Please help me thank all of our TAs for powering through 108 demos!!! It's been really great starting to read through some of the feedback to learn more about how much you have accomplished and grown.

We will post tomorrow with info for folks who did not get to go as well as folks who need makeups.

As a reminder, we will still have lecture on Monday and Thursday next week.

Good night y'all!

elements.text:

Good night y'all!

text:
<!channel> Good morning! A few announcements:

1. Grades for demos are going up today, and anyone who did not pass will receive feedback today as well over Slack.
2. Anyone who did not demo yesterday or did not pass their demo will go on Monday after lecture. You will receive a link from a TA when they are ready for you. These will start at 6:30 central time until the end of class. 
3. We may also contact folks in class about makeup interviews depending on staff availability also starting at 6:30. Additional scheduling opportunities for makeup interviews will go out to folks today/Monday.
4. We do still have lecture Monday and Thursday and everyone is expected to attend. Shaw from Talent Management will be there Monday, so bring your apprenticeship program questions to them. Then Shawn will cover Project Closeout. Thursday we are going over what to expect post-class and recommendations for next steps in your tech journey. 
5. We are working very hard to get all round 2 resume edits done today. Before I log off I will contact anyone who does not yet have edits on their resume if we do not get to everyone. If you do not have edits from me/Lexi or a message about it, please reach out on Monday but not before. 
Have a good weekend!
